SELECT `clientType`, gameId, `zoneId`, channelId, `statDate`, sum(`roleEstablishs`) as roleEstablishs, sum(`roleLogins`) as roleLogins, sum(`roleFirstLogins`) as roleFirstLogins, sum(`loginTimes`) as loginTimes, sum(`roleOnlines`) as roleOnlines FROM s_role_twenty_minute
GROUP BY date_format(`statDate`,'%H:%i') ORDER BY statDate DESC
SELECT SUM(r.roleOnlines) as roleOnlines,r.statDate FROM s_role_twenty_minute r GROUP BY date_format(r.statDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') ORDER BY roleOnlines DESC limit 1
SELECT SUM(r.roleOnlines) FROM s_role_twenty_minute r GROUP BY date_format(r.statDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') ORDER BY statDate DESC limit 1

SELECT MAX(b.roleOnlines) FROM (SELECT SUM(r.roleOnlines) AS roleOnlines,r.statDate FROM s_role_twenty_minute r GROUP BY date_format(r.statDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') ORDER BY statDate DESC) b GROUP BY date_format(b.statDate,'%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT MIN(b.roleOnlines) FROM (SELECT SUM(r.roleOnlines) AS roleOnlines,r.statDate FROM s_role_twenty_minute r GROUP BY date_format(r.statDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') ORDER BY statDate DESC) b GROUP BY date_format(b.statDate,'%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT AVG(b.roleOnlines) FROM (SELECT SUM(r.roleOnlines) AS roleOnlines,r.statDate FROM s_role_twenty_minute r GROUP BY date_format(r.statDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') ORDER BY statDate DESC) b GROUP BY date_format(b.statDate,'%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT MAX(b.roleOnlines) as maxRoleOnlines, MIN(b.roleOnlines) as minRoleOnlines, AVG(b.roleOnlines) as avgRoleOnlines,b.statDate FROM (SELECT sum(r.roleOnlines) as roleOnlines,r.statDate FROM s_role_twenty_minute r GROUP BY date_format(r.statDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') ORDER BY statDate DESC) b GROUP BY date_format(b.statDate,'%Y-%m-%d')
